name: Traveler's Tunic
description: Simple cloth garb for those always on the road. Offers minimal protection but full mobility.

name: Padded Gambeson
description: Thick quilted jacket worn under armor or alone. Some bulk, but warm and absorbent.

name: Leather Vest
description: Flexible boiled leather torso armor. Lightweight and silent.

name: Shadowweave Jerkin
description: Dark leather reinforced with alchemical thread. Favored by assassins.

name: Studded Jacket
description: Hardened leather embedded with iron studs. Clinks faintly when moving.

name: Bone Harness
description: Tribal armor of lacquered beast bones. Intimidating and ritualistic.

name: Lamellar Vest
description: Layered metal plates sewn into leather. Popular with eastern mercenaries.

name: Iron Chain Shirt
description: A common soldier's armor. Good balance between protection and weight.

name: Elkhide Warcoat
description: Heavy hide coat reinforced with bone and fur. Often worn by barbarian clans.

name: Scale Hauberk
description: Metal scales riveted to leather backing. Clinks slightly in motion.

name: Runed Brigandine
description: Steel plates stitched inside an embroidered coat. Often bears noble insignia.

name: Half-Plate Cuirass
description: Chest and shoulder armor of forged steel. Leaves limbs lightly armored.

name: Wyvernscale Plating
description: Crafted from wyvern hide and scales. Resistant to heat and claws alike.

name: Mountain Guard Harness
description: Massive dwarven steel plates with integrated shoulder guards and backplate.

name: Knight’s Bastion Plate
description: Elite full-body plate polished to a shine. Worn by royal vanguards.

name: Blacksteel Shell
description: A matte, darkened armor of volcanic-forged steel. Heavy and imposing.

name: Frostbone Harness
description: Spiked armor of frozen beast bone and chill iron. Rare and brutal.

name: Sunforged Splintmail
description: Ornate armor forged in temple fires. Gleams with divine authority.

name: Witchguard Carapace
description: Armor built from resin and bone, often worn by cultists and forest witches.

name: Hedge Knight Harness
description: Patchwork armor made from scavenged pieces. Worn by wanderers and sellswords.
